testcase.name: test.tests.01-run.testfunc
testcase.system-out:
ssh -t iotlab@saclay.iot-lab.info 'socat - tcp:nrf52dk-1.saclay.iot-lab.info:20000' +++ timeout 1 +++ +++ timeout 2 +++ +++ timeout 3 +++ +++ timeout 4 +++ +++ timeout 5 +++ SUCCESS main(): This is RIOT! (Version: buildtest) START Test setting thread flags from (x)timer callback You should see the message '+++ timeout XX +++' printed to the screen 5 times, once every 100 milliseconds
+++ timeout 1 +++ +++ timeout 2 +++ +++ timeout 3 +++ +++ timeout 4 +++ +++ timeout 5 +++ SUCCESS
